results.description: Brisbane Roar, managed by former Liverpool and England striker Robbie Fowler, sign former Bury midfielder Jay O'Shea.
results.title: Robbie Fowler's Brisbane Roar sign ex-Bury midfielder Jay O'Shea

results.description: Ziggy Gordon says his desire to "experience new challenges" is behind his decision to join Central Coast Mariners after his second spell with Hamilton Academical.
results.title: Ziggy Gordon relishing Central Coast Mariners challenge after Hamilton exit

thumbnail.altText: Ziggy Gordon celebrates scoring for Hamilton Accies

results.description: Robbie Fowler's Brisbane Roar sign Shrewsbury striker Aaron Amadi-Holloway, Bury defender Tom Aldred and Carlisle's Macaulay Gillesphey.
results.shortTitle: Brisbane Roar boss Fowler signs EFL trio
results.title: Robbie Fowler's Brisbane Roar sign Tom Aldred, Aaron Amadi-Holloway & Macaulay Gillesphey

results.description: Watch dancing goalkeeper Andrew Redmayne put off Perth Glory's penalty takers as Sydney FC won the A-League Grand Final.
results.shortTitle: Dancing keeper is penalty shootout hero in A-League Grand Final
results.title: A-League Grand Final: Dancing goalkeeper Andrew Redmayne is penalty shootout hero for Sydney FC

results.description: Former Liverpool striker Robbie Fowler is appointed as the new manager of Australian side Brisbane Roar.
results.title: Robbie Fowler: Brisbane Roar name former Liverpool striker as new boss

results.description: Championship-bound referee Jarred Gillett wears a microphone during his final A-League match, offering a revealing insight into the on-pitch conversations between officials and players.
results.title: Championship-bound referee wears microphone in final A-League match

results.description: Former Olympic sprinter fails to agree a contract with Australian soccer team.
results.shortTitle: Usain Bolt's football dream might be over
results.title: Usain Bolt leaves Australia's Central Coast Mariners

results.description: Usain Bolt scores two goals for Central Coast Mariners in trial game
results.title: Usain Bolt scores twice for Central Coast Mariners

thumbnail.altText: Usain Bolt spreads his arms wide to celebrate scoring a goal

results.description: The eight-time Olympic sprint champion is expected to make his professional football debut for the Central Coast Mariners in Australia.
results.shortTitle: Bolt to make football debut in friendly
results.title: Usain Bolt to make Central Coast Mariners debut in friendly

results.description: Fans gather to greet Usain Bolt at Sydney airport as the Jamaican arrives for his training period with A-League side Central Coast Mariners.
results.shortTitle: Fans gather for Bolt in Australia
results.title: Usain Bolt: Fans gather for sprinting legend in Australia

thumbnail.altText: Bolt poses for photographs with the fans at Sydney airport before his stint with Central Coast Mariners

results.description: Australian club Sydney FC sign Bolton Wanderers forward Adam Le Fondre on a "multi-year" contract.

results.title: Adam Le Fondre: Sydney FC sign Bolton Wanderers forward

results.description: Manchester City's new 19-year-old Australia midfielder Daniel Arzani is set to join Celtic on loan.
results.shortTitle: Man City's Arzani set for Celtic loan
results.title: Daniel Arzani: Man City signing from Melbourne City set for Celtic loan

results.description: Sprint legend Usain Bolt will join Central Coast Mariners for an "indefinite training period", the Australian club confirm.
results.shortTitle: Bolt to join Central Coast Mariners
results.title: Usain Bolt: Eight-time Olympic champion to train with Central Coast Mariners

results.description: Melbourne Victory player Kosta Barbarouses climbs up to fix a broken net with sticky tape after it becomes detached during the team's 5-2 win over Central Coast Mariners.
results.shortTitle: Football DIY - Players fix broken net in A-League game
results.title: A-League: Melbourne Victory player fixes broken net with tape

results.description: Former Wigan manager Warren Joyce takes charge of Australian A-League club Melbourne City.
results.shortTitle: Joyce takes over at Melbourne City
results.title: Warren Joyce: Former Wigan manager takes charge of Melbourne City
